attributes.description: Beast of a Bakkie that still drives like a dream. This vehicle is in a tremendous condition. Don't be put off by its mileage. It has spec and extra features including Alloy Wheels, AUX, Bluetooth connectivity, Rubberized Bin, Side Steps, Canopy, Diff-Lock and Spare Keys are available. It comes with a Full Franchise Service History. All the vehicles that we place on Cars have gone through a rigorous mechanical inspection one of our car experts as well. Any vehicle bought from us will receive a Premium Valet to the value of R750 before delivery. We take pride in being a family owned and operated business that always refer to our founding principles of integrity, honesty and fairness. With those principles in mind we set out with a customer-centric approach that allows ease of access to the vehicle of your dreams just 5 days or less. We connect customers to any of the major financial institutions in South Africa with an 87% approval rate for potential family members that meet the minimum requirements for financing. With us Service is not a Department, it's in our DNA! We welcome Trade-ins! Trading Hours: Monday - Friday : 8AM to 5PM Saturday & Public Holiday : 8AM to 1PM Sunday : CLOSED Price EXCLUDES Administration, License and Registration Fees.
